name: Phineas and Ferb: Ride Again
description:
Phineas and Ferb: Ride Again follows the story from the show, with step-brothers Phineas Flynn and Ferb Fletcher building new inventions whilst their pet platypus Perry attempts to foil the plans of the evil Dr. Heinz Doofenshmirtz.

Phineas and Ferb can both use their previous inventions as they traverse levels of many different environments in order to build their inventions. Perry is also able to use a jetpack and a grappling hook as he attempts to reach Doofenshmirtz's layer. Meanwhile, Phineas' older sister Candace Flynn is also playable, as she travels through mazes, trampolines, lily pads, and more as she attempts to bust her brothers.
